frameDefinitions: This frame concerns rituals performed in line with religious beliefs or tradition.
This frame has to do with nouns denoting types of entities.
An Agent matches location with an Entity in order to fulfill some  Purpose.
This frame concerns people being in an altered mental state that is induced by an Intoxicant.
An Earner receives Earnings by providing Goods to a Buyer; providing the Goods also generally entails a cost, which may or may not be included in the consideration.
This  frame contains words that talk about how Speakers name Entities.
frameExamples: In certain fertility <t>rites</t> in Burma , a woman desirous of offspring is required not only to approach the King Cobra but to plant a kiss on its mouth .
I don't like this newfangled <t><fex name='Subtype'>kind</fex></t> of  fish.
I ca n't remember how many times he <t>visited</t> ! DNI
This reflects the 15 % jump in <t><fex name='Earnings'>earnings</fex></t> over 1994 .
They drove through an area <t>nicknamed</t> Sniper's Alley
listRoleDefinitions: This is the religious or cultural leader who performs and/or leads the rite.
The role <fen>Member</fen> describes the member of the religious or cultural group who participates in/undergoes the rite.
<fen>Organization</fen> identifies the institution in which the rite is prescribed.
This role identifies the <fen>Instrument</fen> used to perform a particular rite.
This role identifies the state which the rite is hoped or intended to bring about.
The type of ritual or ceremony being performed.
This role indicates an object on which a rite is performed.
Rites may confer a <fen>New_status</fen> on a participant (e.g. rank, membership).
The <fen>Guardian</fen> is the member of the <fen>Organization</fen> who instigates the rite for someone of which they are a guardian.
When the rite is performed
Where the rite takes place.
The entity which denotes a subtype of the more general <fen>Category</fen>.
The more general type that the target denotes a subtype of. This role is obligatory and should be labeled DNI when not present.
The sentient entity that is temporarily with the <fen>Entity</fen> in order to fulfil some <fen>Purpose</fen>.

The physical entity that is permanently associated with entities or characteristics that the <fen>Agent</fen> wishes to use for some <fen>Purpose</fen>.  During the visit, the <fen>Agent</fen> matches location with the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The time at which a visit is made.
A description of the position of the <fen>Agent</fen> during the visit.
The mental state of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is changed by an <fen>Intoxicant</fen> .
The <fen>Intoxicant</fen> alters the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s mental experience.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> becomes intoxicated.
The <fen>Earner</fen> is involved in a transaction or set of transactions as the party that receives payment.
<fen>Earnings</fen> are the money given to the <fen>Earner</fen> in a transaction, generally in exchange for <fen>Goods</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Earner</fen> makes their <fen>Earnings</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Earner</fen> makes their <fen>Earnings</fen>.
The entity that Speakers refer to by using the Name.
The linguistic expression by which Speakers refer to the Entity.
The person who uses the linguistic expression (Name) to refer to the Referent.
When the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
listRoleExamples: His baptism <fex>into the Catholic Church</fex> is scheduled for next Sunday.
Elliott was almost ordained <fex>as a priest</fex>
<fex>Mr. and Mrs. Wilson</fex> baptized their son.
I don't like this <fex>kind</fex> of fish.
They created a new breed <fex>of dog</fex>.
She made a lot of money <fex>in Africa</fex> .

sourceCandidateSpans.text: theThe Chofetz Chayim (Rabbi Yisrael Meir HaCohen Kagan
Rabbi Moshe Ben Shmuel Schreiber Sofer
Rabbi Yaakov Ben Yehuda Leib Eibeshitz
thirty-third day of the 'Omer) in the year 2448
